text:
@KellyO Everyone needs time to rest and relax in order to keep themselves at their best mentally. But golfing somehow alternates from a necessary diversion to evidence of presidential laziness, or vice versa, every time occupant of the White House changes. 
https://t.co/suKgeEXJ5F
